name: Create new tasks In Todoist from new records in Airtable
description:
This template periodically checks for new records in Airtable and uses the retrieved information to create new tasks in Todoist.

Your Airtable table should have at least these columns:
1) Content
2) Description
3) Due date
4) Created time

The template is scheduled to run every 15 minutes. You can change the schedule after you set up the template.
